title: Use This Method to Dry Herbs for Stronger Medicinal Properties
itunes:title: Use This Method for Drying Herbs for Stronger Medicinal Properties
description: We're bringing in the harvest and that means herbs for the spice and natural medicine cabinet. Use these methods and tips to make sure you're getting the strongest medicinal properties in your herbs including the best harvest time, drying method, AND storing them correctly. Join my FREE live Using Herbs Effectively & Safely During Cold & Flu Season here https://melissaknorris.com/herbclass and get resource links for this episode at https://melissaknorris.com/273
